title: "Wonderland and Robot Invader release first ever WebXR Conversion of a native Meta Quest game, DEAD SECRET CIRCLE"
excerpt: "Browser usage from VR headsets has been growing steadily, and web-based VR offers an interesting marketing opportunity to native VR developers. Robot Invader and Wonderland partnered to spearhead the new marketing concept with Robot Invader's DEAD SECRET CIRCLE, released as a native game for Nintendo Switch in 2022 and Meta Quest in early 2023."
